name: SKTileGroupRule
desc: Rules that describe how various tiles should be placed in a map.

items.name: init(adjacency: SKTileAdjacencyMask, tileDefinitions: [SKTileDefinition])
items.desc: Initializes a new tile group rule with adjacency rules and tile definitions.

items.name: var adjacency: SKTileAdjacencyMask
items.desc: The adjacency requirement for this rule.

items.name: struct SKTileAdjacencyMask
items.desc: An enumeration defining how neighboring tiles are automatically placed next to each other.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: A name associated with the tile group rule.

items.name: var tileDefinitions: [SKTileDefinition]
items.desc: The tile definitions used for this rule.
